articles.title: Former US talk show host Wendy Williams has aphasia and dementia - BBC.com
articles.description: A care team for the US talk show host shared the update "to correct inaccurate and hurtful rumours".
articles.content:
Wendy Williams hosted a nationally syndicated daytime talk show from 2008 to 2021
US daytime talk show legend Wendy Williams Hunter was diagnosed last year with primary progressive aphasia and front… [+3706 chars]
